lib(shieny)
lib(ggplt2)
lib(deplyr)
## we chose what we work on

em <- emrls[,c(1;8,5)]

## now we apply the calculations
shienysvr(fun(i, o) {
o$plt <- rdrPlt({
      ##we choose the stones we require
        em <- fil(emrald, gr(i$fcut, fcut), gr(i$dcol, dcol), gr(i$clr, clr))
        ## now we make a modal out of the recieved data 
        theft <- Im( sp~emcarot, em)
##now our comments on the price
           com <- find(theft, emdata = data.frm(emcarat = i$emcar,
                                                  fcut = i$fcut,
                                                  dcol = i$dcol,
                                                  clr = i$clr))
                                              })
